characters.name: Mickey Mouse
characters.description: The Disney icon, a cheerful and optimistic mouse always ready to help his friends.

characters.name: Minnie Mouse
characters.description: Mickey's inseparable companion, elegant and full of sweetness.

characters.name: Donald Duck
characters.description: The hot-tempered but endearing duck with a big personality.

characters.name: Goofy
characters.description: A clumsy but kind-hearted dog, always making people laugh with his antics.

characters.name: Pluto
characters.description: Mickey's loyal and playful dog.

characters.name: Daisy Duck
characters.description: Donald’s girlfriend, refined and with a strong character.

characters.name: Ariel
characters.description: The mermaid princess who dreams of living on the surface.

characters.name: Simba
characters.description: The future king of the jungle, brave and determined.

characters.name: Elsa
characters.description: The queen of Arendelle with the power to control ice and snow.

characters.name: Anna
characters.description: Elsa's brave and optimistic sister, always looking out for her family.

characters.name: Buzz Lightyear
characters.description: The heroic space ranger always ready for action.

characters.name: Woody
characters.description: The cowboy, leader of the toys, and Buzz’s best friend.

characters.name: Tiana
characters.description: The hardworking and ambitious princess who dreams of opening her own restaurant.

characters.name: Belle
characters.description: A young, intelligent, and curious woman who falls in love with the Beast.

characters.name: Peter Pan
characters.description: The boy who never grows up and lives adventures in Neverland.

characters.name: Jasmine
characters.description: The princess of Agrabah who seeks freedom and adventure.

characters.name: Aladdin
characters.description: A young adventurer who finds a magical lamp.

characters.name: Pocahontas
characters.description: A young Native American who seeks harmony between her people and the settlers.

characters.name: Mulan
characters.description: A brave warrior who disguises herself as a man to save her father.

characters.name: Hercules
characters.description: The Greek demigod seeking his place on Mount Olympus.

characters.name: Tarzan
characters.description: A man raised by gorillas in the jungle.

characters.name: Rapunzel
characters.description: The princess with magical hair who has lived her entire life in a tower.

characters.name: Flynn Rider
characters.description: The charismatic thief who becomes Rapunzel’s ally.

characters.name: Moana
characters.description: The adventurer who sails across the ocean to save her people.

characters.name: Maui
characters.description: The demigod who helps Moana on her journey.

characters.name: Wreck-It Ralph
characters.description: The video game villain who wants to become a hero.

characters.name: Vanellope von Schweetz
characters.description: A kart racer with a sparkling personality.

characters.name: Nemo
characters.description: A little clownfish who embarks on a big adventure.

characters.name: Dory
characters.description: The optimistic blue fish with memory problems.

characters.name: Lightning McQueen
characters.description: The fast race car who learns the value of friendship.

characters.name: Mater
characters.description: The friendly, clumsy tow truck who is Lightning's best friend.

characters.name: Cinderella
characters.description: The kind-hearted young woman who finds her destiny at a royal ball.

characters.name: Snow White
characters.description: The princess known for her kindness, the fairest of them all.

characters.name: Sleeping Beauty
characters.description: Princess Aurora, who falls into a deep sleep due to a curse.

characters.name: Prince Eric
characters.description: The brave prince who falls in love with Ariel.

characters.name: The Beast
characters.description: A cursed prince who must learn to love to break the spell.

characters.name: Stitch
characters.description: A mischievous alien creature with a big heart.

characters.name: Lilo
characters.description: A Hawaiian girl who adopts Stitch as her pet.

characters.name: Tinker Bell
characters.description: The mischievous fairy and loyal friend of Peter Pan.
